name: Goblin Janitor
description:
The sword chooses the hero.

It sure didn't pick you.

You wanted to be the hero, but instead you got the janitorial position right under him. But, hey, it's better than nothing, right?

Play as Douggie, goblin janitor, and clean up the messes that the hero makes.

Controls: WASD + J + K (or space)

This game was made in one week for Bored Pixels Jam 8. The team is made up of three brothers.

Built with Godot.

The plugin Dialogic created by coppolaemilio was used for the dialogue in the game. It is phenomenal, I cannot praise it enough!

Content Warning: lots of cartoonish blood and also some sadness
